description: The initiative at Rancho Mastatal focuses on regenerative practices, sustainable living, and permaculture education in Costa Rica. Founded by a dedicated team of foreigners, the center offers training programs, apprenticeships, and eco-tourism experiences, fostering a community that emphasizes harmony with nature. With a commitment to local sourcing and community integration, they aim to inspire visitors to adopt sustainable lifestyles, creating a ripple effect that extends beyond their immediate environment.
name: Rancho Mastatal
